data.name: There is No GreenDam
data.detailed_description:
About the game


This game is produced on a whim
by a group of idle fanatics (perhaps),

After so many years,
We've finally ported her to Steam,
During all those years,
Have you forgotten those you worked hard for so far?

Hope this game can not only evoke our spirit of youth,
But also arouse your wandering heart.

STAFF

data.short_description: Simply wanted to find a job, but turned out to cause so much trouble. Then I received a mysterious test item... a young girl?! Am I gonna start living happily ever after? or just the prelude of a disaster! My story with her has just begun... Hope this game can make you feel a little touched.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Memory 128Mb
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters are over the age of 18.
have some sexual humor and suggestive content.
